name: Rulr
description:
Sometimes you don't care enough or have enough time for your kingdom, that's why we have released Rulr. Its the app that lets you make decisions for your kingdom on the go.

All you have to do is say Yay or Nay to those pesky royal decisions. Using our patented technology we give you all the information you need in 3 sentences, allowing you to make the decisions you need to make FAST! 

No longer will you have to sit around in that boring royal hall, you can get everything done from bed, from the latrine, even from the back of your horse.

**Disclaimer**

This game was made as a self game jam since I am working for ludum dare. So enjoy, I made it in 10ish hours with a break for Pho. It was delicious. I hope you get some enjoyment out of it.
